name: Block Gluing Square
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Our hero, Squishboy, has been separated from his friend, Squishgirl!
Help get Squishboy to Squishgirl's side, so they may be joined together once again!

Block Gluing Square is a puzzle platformer where you glue up and join blocks together to create structures that you can use to get through each level and win the game.

*The game still may have a few bugs and glitches. Resetting the level by pressing R will fix them should they occur.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Pick up/Place down blocks

R - Restart Level
